mapper.insert: insert into mg_app_user_info (user_id, user_mobile, user_password, user_pet_name, user_email, insert_by, insert_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update mg_app_user_info set user_mobile = #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pet_name = #{userPetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_by = #{insertBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_mobile, user_password, user_pet_name, user_email, insert_by, insert_time from mg_app_user_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select user_id, user_mobile, user_password, user_pet_name, user_email, insert_by, insert_time from mg_app_user_info
select count(user_id) from mg_app_user_info where user_mobile = #{userMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
